name: $read
desc: Read the state of a specific version of the resource.

name: $vread
desc: Update an existing resource by its id (or create it if it is new).

name: $update
desc: Update an existing resource by posting a set of changes to it.

name: $delete
desc: Retrieve the change history for a particular resource, type of resource, or the entire system.

name: $history
desc: Create a new resource with a server assigned id.

name: $create
desc: Search a resource type or all resources based on some filter criteria.

name: $search
desc: Get a Capability Statement for the system.

name: $capabilities
desc: Update, create or delete a set of resources as a single transaction.

name: $transaction
desc: perform a set of a separate interactions in a single http operation

name: $batch
desc: Perform an operation as defined by an OperationDefinition.
